subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Brad Penny pitched effectively into the seventh inning, Alex Avila had a run-scoring single and the Detroit Tigers beat the Tampa Bay Rays, 2-1, on Tuesday night in St. Petersburg, Fla.
snippet: Brad Penny pitched effectively into the seventh inning, Alex Avila had a run-scoring single and the Detroit Tigers beat the Tampa Bay Rays, 2-1, on Tuesday night in St. Petersburg, Fla.
